name: Anvil Track Necklace
description:
Long necklace of gold plated brass mesh, up-cycled from a mid-century vintage purse, inset with tracks of contrasting gunmetal chain.

Shapes are carved from the bag by opening the individual mesh links' tiny tines and carefully deconstructing the fabric, then are woven back together—and the edges framed—with dark gunmetal chain.

Anvil Track Necklace measures 32" around, the pendant dropping an additional 2.5" in front. Slips on. Handmade in San Francisco and signed with a hand-finished brass signature link.

name: Silk Rope Necklace
description:
Textile and metal mesh necklace available in a variety of colors and patterns. Vintage silk strips, up-cycled from an Indian sari or Japanese kimono, feature weighted rope focals of new or vintage brass mesh.

Silk Rope Necklace length adjusts up to 32 inches. Brass mesh tassel detail and insignia link at adjustable closure. Handmade in San Francisco.

name: Shield and Banner Mesh Neckplate
description:
Graphic neckplate of gold and silver mesh, up-cycled from two vintage Whiting and Davis purses. Articulated metal mesh is deconstructed and re-engineered, the shapes woven together and framed in dark gunmetal chain.

This reversible necklace offers two very distinct looks: feature the link side for a richly detailed low sheen, or flip it over for extra flash.

Shield and Banner Mesh Neckplate measures 18" around, drops an additional 2.5" in front, and closes comfortably with a lobster clasp at center back. Handmade in San Francisco and signed with a hand finished brass signature link.

name: Shield Mesh Neckplate
description:
Graphic neckplate of softly patinaed gold brass mesh. Vintage metal mesh is deconstructed, re-engineered, and framed in a dark gunmetal chain outline.

This reversible necklace offers two very distinct looks: feature the link side for a richly detailed low sheen, or flip it over for extra flash.

Necklace measures 18" around, drops an additional 2.5" in front, and closes comfortably with a lobster clasp at center back. Handmade in San Francisco and signed with a hand finished brass logo link.

name: Heavy Layered Mesh Necklace Mix
description:
Graphic necklace grouping features softly patinaed, gold-plated brass mesh in a mix of geometric shapes. Up-cycled from vintage Whiting and Davis bags, the articulated mesh is deconstructed, re-engineered, and framed in dark gunmetal chain. As with all in the 'Framed Mesh Elements' series, this reversible necklace offers two very distinct looks: choose the link side for a more industrial, subtly glowing effect (shown here) or flip it over if you want a little disco flash. Five-tier necklace measures 18" around, drops an additional 8" in front, and closes with a comfortable lobster swivel clasp at center back. This necklace grouping is available in gold, silver, or a mixed-metal version that combines the two. Certain colorways are made to order and may require an additional two weeks for shipping. (Pictures #2 and #3 show this necklace layered with others.)
mesh, deco, vintage, jewelry, handmade, up-cycled, re-purposed, oxidized, sterling silver, patina, wabi sabi, rustic

options.name: gold and silver mix w/ gunmetal chain

name: Large Striped Chevron Mesh Neckplate
description: Chevron neckplate of black and gold 'beadlite' bubble mesh, up-cycled from two vintage Whiting and Davis bags. Intricately patterned chevron showstopper grows from many small metal mesh shapes, pieced together and framed with dark gunmetal chain. This reversible necklace offers two distinct looks; choose the enamel side for its bold, contrasting chevrons - or wear the metal side for a more intricately patterned, subtle glow. Necklace measures 17" around, drops an additional 5" in front, and closes comfortably with a lobster swivel clasp at center back. Handmade in San Francisco and signed with a hand finished brass signature link. Note: Last image shows the long version of this necklace, layered with various others.

name: Five Bar Mesh Station Necklace
description:
Versatile necklace positions fluid gold sections of vintage mesh along double rows of dark gunmetal chain.

Mesh is up-cycled from a vintage Whiting & Davis purse (circa 1930s-1980s), the new shapes woven together with the gunmetal chain.

Five Bar Mesh Station Necklace measures 34" around and slips on. Handmade in San Francisco and signed with a hand-finished brass signature link.

name: Mesh Knots Necklace - Long Convertible
description:
Amazingly versatile gold mesh necklace can be easily configured to create at least five stunning looks—one for every day of the week! Wear it long, casually looped, or twisted in a variety of ways to create stunning, textural effects.

More than five feet of vintage, Whiting & Davis metal mesh is deconstructed and re-engineered to create this piece—the border painstakingly woven with the signature  'Framed Mesh' detail of dark gunmetal chain.

Placement of knots is carefully designed to yield pleasing results in every configuration. Necklace also ships with an accompanying pieced, framed mesh ring for creating looped pendant styles.

Long Knots Necklace measures 38" around and closes with a lobster clasp at center back. Handmade in San Francisco and signed with a hand-finished brass signature link at closure.

name: Draped Mesh Collar - Chevrons
description:
Modern, mixed-metal statement necklace features a chevron-detailed collar band of vintage Whiting & Davis mesh, generously draped with a dramatic panel of graduated gunmetal chains.

Articulated metal mesh is carefully deconstructed by opening the individual links' tines and unlocking the mesh to create shapes, which are then painstakingly woven back together—and the edges framed—with the dark gunmetal chain.

Reversible necklace offers two distinct looks: Wear the link side for a richly detailed, soft glow or flip it over for a little disco flash (as shown here.)

Draped Chevron Collar Necklace measures 1" wide at the band, 32" around, and drops an additional 2.5" in front. Slips on. Handmade in San Francisco and signed with a hand-finished brass signature link.

name: Bar Rectangle Mesh Necklace
description:
Rectangle of softly patinaed gold-plated mesh, up-cycled from a reclaimed vintage Whiting and Davis purse. A glittering swatch of wearable history framed in a graphic border of dark gunmetal chain. From the Framed Mesh Elements collection.

Reversible necklace offers two distinct looks: wear the flat side for maximum flash, or flip to the rear link side for a more industrial, low-sheen effect.

Necklace measures 30" around, the pendant dropping an additional 2.25" in front. Slips on. Handmade in San Francisco and signed with a hand-finished brass logo link.

name: Metal Mesh Ladder Necklace
description:
Long pendant necklace stacks wide rungs of vintage metal mesh, up-cycled from a mid-century purse and layered with stripes of gunmetal chain.

Shapes are carved from the vintage bag by opening the individual mesh links' tiny tines and carefully deconstructing the fabric, then are woven back together—and the edges framed—with dark gunmetal chain, creating the stacked design you see here.

Great by itself or layered with other pieces, this reversible necklace offers two very distinct looks: feature the link side for a richly detailed, low-sheen effect, or flip it over for full-on disco flash (as shown.)

Metal Mesh Ladder Necklace measures 32" around, the pendant dropping an additional 3" in front. Slips on. Handmade in San Francisco and signed with a hand-finished brass signature link at closure.

name: Angle Inset Necklace
description:
Reversible pendant necklace pieces angled sections of vintage metal mesh, up-cycled from two mid-century purses.

Shapes are carved from the vintage bags by opening the individual links' tiny tines and carefully deconstructing the fabric, then are woven back together and framed with dark, matte, gunmetal chain.

Great by itself or layered with other pieces, this reversible necklace offers two very distinct looks: black enamel with gold links or tonal gold mesh.

Angle Inset Necklace measures 32" around, the pendant dropping an additional 3" in front. Slips on. Handmade in San Francisco and signed with a hand-finished brass logo link.

name: Large Drop Mesh Necklace
description:
Large drop of softly patinaed gold-plated mesh, up-cycled from a reclaimed vintage Whiting and Davis purse. A glittering swatch of wearable history framed in a graphic border of dark gunmetal chain. From the Framed Mesh Elements collection.

Reversible necklace offers two distinct looks: wear the flat side for maximum flash, or flip to the rear link side for a more industrial, low-sheen effect.

Large Drop Mesh Necklace measures 24" around, the pendant dropping an additional 1.5" in front. Handmade in San Francisco and signed with a hand finished brass logo link.

name: Small Rectangle Mesh Necklace
description:
Small rectangle of rustic patinaed gold-plated mesh, up-cycled from a reclaimed vintage Whiting and Davis purse. A glittering swatch of wearable history framed in a graphic border of dark gunmetal chain. From the Framed Mesh Elements collection.

Reversible necklace offers two distinct looks: wear the flat side for maximum flash, or flip to the rear link side for a more industrial, low-sheen effect.

Small Rectangle Mesh Necklace adjusts from 17" to 18", pendant drops an additional 7/8" in front. Handmade in San Francisco and signed with a hand finished brass logo link.

name: Small Drop Mesh Necklace
description:
Half-round of softly patinaed gold-plated mesh, up-cycled from a reclaimed vintage Whiting and Davis purse. A glittering swatch of wearable history framed in a graphic border of dark gunmetal chain. From the Framed Mesh Elements collection.

Small Drop Mesh Necklace adjusts from 17" to 18", pendant measures .75" x 1"
 Handmade in San Francisco and signed with a hand finished brass logo link.

name: Triangle Station Necklace
description:
Striking necklace of vintage mesh triangles stationed along a line of dark gunmetal chain. Also a great layering piece, easily enhancing a variety of necklaces - add it when you want to bring a little flash to your current faves.

Triangle Station Necklace measures 18" around and closes with a gunmetal brass lobster clasp. Hand-finished brass signature link at closure.

name: Triangle Station Necklace - Two Tiered
description:
Two tiered necklace of vintage mesh triangles stationed along lines of dark gunmetal chain. Also a great layering piece, easily enhancing a variety of necklaces - add it when you want to bring a little flash to your current faves.

Triangle Station Necklace measures 18" around, dropping an additional 2.25" in front. Handmade in San Francisco and signed with a hand finished brass logo link at closure.

name: Stud Mesh Chevron Bib
description:
Chunky, faceted, stud mesh necklace makes a strong statement - yet pairs easily with almost every outfit. You'll never want to take it off! Chevron panel is up-cycled from a vintage Whiting & Davis purse, circa 1930-1940, then framed with a border of large, gunmetal brass rolo chain.

Stud Mesh Chevron Bib adjusts from 17"-18" around, closing with a lobster clasp at center back. The mesh focal piece measures 3" across.

Handmade in San Francisco and signed with a hand-finished brass logo link.

name: Vintage Mesh Badge Necklace
description:
Chevron banner of weathered gold-plated brass mesh, reclaimed from a mid-century purse, is suspended from a handmade brass frame and edged in dark gunmetal chain.

Vintage Mesh Badge Necklace measures 32" around. Signed with a hand finished brass signature link at the 1.5" x 2" pendant. Slips on.

name: Pieced Badge Necklace - Vintage Framed Mesh
description:
Mixed metal banner pieced with gold-plated, silver-plated, and black enamel brass mesh reclaimed from three vintage purses. Suspended from a handmade brass frame and edged in dark gunmetal chain.

Pieced Badge Necklace measures 32" around, pendant 1.5" x 2". Slips on. Handmade in San Francisco and signed with a hand-finished brass signature link.

name: Pieced Badge Necklace w/ Fringe
description:
Mixed metal badge pieced with gold-plated, silver-plated, and black enamel brass mesh, reclaimed from three vintage purses. Suspended from a handmade brass frame and trimmed with a graduated chevron fringe of dark gunmetal chain.

Pieced Badge Necklace w/ Fringe measures 32" around, 1.5" x 3.5" pendant. Slips on. Handmade in San Francisco and signed with a hand finished brass logo link.

name: Stud Mesh Arrow Necklace - Gold
description:
Golden point of jumbo faceted stud mesh up-cycled from a vintage Whiting & Davis purse swings beneath a panel of vintage Whiting & Davis stainless steel ring mesh. On heavy gunmetal chain.

Gold Stud Mesh Arrow Necklace measures 30" around, the pendant dropping another 2". Slips on. Handmade in San Francisco and signed with a hand-finished brass signature link.

name: Mini Shield Mesh Necklace
description:
Mini two-tone shield necklace rendered in reclaimed vintage Whiting & Davis mesh. Pieced silver and gold mesh sections are laced together and framed with gunmetal chain.

Mini Shield Mesh Necklace measures 30" long, pendant measures 1.5" wide. Slips on. Handmade in San Francisco and signed with a hand finished brass logo link.

name: Stacked Chevron Mesh Necklace
description:
Long necklace with 3 stacked chevrons of vintage mesh, pieced from a Whiting & Davis purse. Gold mesh sections are woven together and framed with gunmetal chain.

Stacked Chevron Mesh Necklace measures 30" around, the pendant dropping an additional 2". Slips on. Handmade in San Francisco and signed with a hand finished brass logo link.

name: Stud Mesh Leather Necklace
description:
Rare, extra large, faceted stud mesh from a 1930s-1940s metal mesh purse, wrapped around wide black leather cording. Whiting & Davis mesh is gold plated brass. Handmade in San Francisco and signed with a hand-finished logo link.

Stud Mesh Leather Necklace measures 18" around, the leather cord is .25" wide, and the mesh focal is .5" x 2.5". Lobster clasp closure with signature logo link detail.

name: Triple Stack Vintage Mesh Bracelet - Bold Gold
description:
Three glowing bands of bright gold mesh, culled from a reclaimed vintage purse and wrapped around black leather cording.

Triple Stack Leather and Mesh Bracelet measures 7.25" around and closes with a gold plated lobster clasp. Handmade in San Francisco and signed with a hand-finished brass logo link.

name: Stud Mesh Leather Bracelet
description:
Rare, extra large, faceted stud mesh from a 1930s-1940s Whiting & Davis metal mesh purse. Wide leather cording. Great alone or grouped as stacking bracelets. Handmade in San Francisco and signed with a hand-finished logo link.

Stud Mesh Leather Bracelet measures 7.25" around, the leather cord is .25" wide, and the mesh focal is .5" x 2". Lobster clasp closure with signature logo link detail.

name: Stud Mesh and Leather Bracelet - Silver
description:
Rare, extra large, faceted stud mesh from a 1930s-1940s Whiting & Davis metal mesh purse. Wide leather cording. Great alone or grouped as stacking bracelets. Handmade in San Francisco and signed with a hand-finished logo link.

Stud Mesh and Leather Bracelet measures 7.25" around, the leather cord is .25" wide, and the mesh focal is .5" x 2". Sterling silver plated lobster clasp closure with signature logo link detail.

name: Stud Mesh Median Bracelet - Silver + Natural
description:
Rare, larger, faceted stud mesh from a patinaed silver 1930s-1940s Whiting & Davis metal mesh purse is wrapped around midsized natural leather cording. Great alone or grouped as stacking bracelets. Handmade in San Francisco and signed with a hand-finished logo link.

Stud Mesh and Leather Bracelet measures 7" around, the leather cord is .19" wide, and the mesh focal is .25" x 2". Lobster clasp closure with signature logo link detail.

name: Stud Mesh Median Bracelet - Gold + Black
description:
Rare, larger, faceted stud mesh from a gold 1930s-1940s Whiting & Davis metal mesh purse is wrapped around midsize leather cording. Great alone or grouped as stacking bracelets. Handmade in San Francisco and signed with a hand-finished logo link.

Stud Mesh and Leather Bracelet measures 7" around, the leather cord is .19" wide, and the mesh focal is .25" x 2". Lobster clasp closure with signature logo link detail.

name: Stud Mesh Median Bracelet - Silver + Black
description:
Rare, larger, faceted stud mesh from a patinaed silver 1930s-1940s Whiting & Davis metal mesh purse is wrapped around midsize leather cording. Great alone or grouped as stacking bracelets. Handmade in San Francisco and signed with a hand-finished logo link.

Stud Mesh and Leather Bracelet measures 7" around, the leather cord is .19" wide, and the mesh focal is .25" x 2". Lobster clasp closure with signature logo link detail.

name: Blackpoint Mesh Earrings
description:
Burnished to glittering gold tips, these mesh earrings are vintage in materials yet modern in line, a fringed panel reflecting the mesh form above, revealing a complete hexagon form.

Original enamel mesh is culled from a mid-century vintage purse, the tips then burnished to reveal the underlying brass.

Blackpoint Mesh Earrings hang approximately 3.25" long including the 14k gold filled ear wires. Handmade in San Francisco, each earring is signed with a hand finished brass logo link.

name: Keystone Mesh Earrings
description:
Vintage mesh is culled from two mid-century purses, the original enamel tips burnished to reveal the underlying brass, then pieced together to inset a notched pattern. Fringed with vintage brass chain.

Keystone Mesh Earrings hang approximately 3.25" long including the 14k gold filled ear wires. Handmade in San Francisco, each earring is signed with a hand finished brass logo link.

name: Mesh Banner Earrings - Rustic Luxe Series
description:
These large fluid earrings of deco era mesh are selected to highlight the naturally worn finish of the original antique material. Glossy black enamel fades into allover softly glittering gold.

Each pair of earrings from this bag is one-of-a-kind, with a unique wear pattern to the black enamel. Sets are carefully matched for patina, with no two pairs exactly alike.

Deco mesh banner earrings hang 3.5" long, suspended from 14k gold-filled ear wires. Handmade in San Francisco, each earring is signed with a hand finished brass logo link.

name: Slim Mesh Earrings - Rustic Luxe Series
description:
Vintage columns of artfully-tarnished enameled mesh salvaged from a faded, deco era, Whiting & Davis flapper purse. Mesh shapes are carefully selected for their graphic patterning and patina—a lovely combination of glittering gold flashes and softly worn enamel—then anchored and finished with dark-oxidized sterling silver details.

Each pair of earrings from this bag is one-of-a-kind, with a unique wear pattern to the black enamel. Sets are carefully matched for patina, with no two pairs exactly alike.

Slim Mesh Earrings hang 3" from the sterling silver ear wires. Handmade in San Francisco.

name: Rainmaker Vintage Mesh Earrings - Gold Facet Stud
description:
Large fluid panels of deco mesh decadence. Rare, gold, faceted stud mesh is pieced into chevron shapes—then linked back together with cascading sheets of dark gunmetal chain.

Chunky gold mesh chevrons are taken from a vintage Whiting & Davis purse, circa 1930s-40s.

Rainmaker Gold Mesh Earrings hang 4.5" long, including the 14K gold filled ear wires. Handmade in San Francisco, each earring is signed with a hand finished brass logo link.

Limited stock.

name: Rainmaker Vintage Mesh Earrings - Pyramid Stud
description:
Large fluid panels of mod deco mesh decadence. Rare and unique, this artfully-tarnished pyramid stud mesh is pieced into chevron shapes—then linked back together with cascading sheets of antiqued brass chain.

Unlike the faceted stud mesh versions of these earrings - which are also rare - these pyramid studs are from a singular purse - the only one we've ever found. From a total of five pairs of earrings, two pairs remain.

Rainmaker Stud Mesh Earrings hang 4.5" long, including the sterling silver ear wires. Handmade in San Francisco, each earring is signed with a hand finished brass logo link.

Extremely limited stock.

name: Swallowtail Mesh Earrings
description:
Deco earrings feature a four-part fan of vintage Whiting and Davis mesh, pieced together with gunmetal chain. Trailing swallowtail fringe in gunmetal accented with 18K gold plated chains.

Swallowtail Mesh Earrings hang 4" from the 14k gold-filled ear wires. Handmade in San Francisco, each earring is signed with a hand finished brass logo link.

name: Deco Glam Pedestal Earrings
description:
Mod geometric earrings, painstakingly hand-pieced with vintage black and silver mesh from two '80s purses, joined with bright new gold mesh. Shapes are combined to form a strong, deco-glam statement. Surprisingly light to wear.

Deco Glam Pedestal Earrings measure 2.75 inches from the 14 karat gold fill ear wires. Handmade in San Francisco, each earring is signed with a hand finished logo link.

name: Deco Glam Abstract Earrings
description:
Deco, by way of the '60s. Mod geometric panel earrings, painstakingly hand-pieced with black mesh from a vintage purse, joined with bright new gold mesh. Shapes are combined to form a strong, deco-glam statement. Surprisingly light to wear.

Deco Glam Abstract Earrings measure 3.75 inches from the 14 karat gold fill ear wires. Handmade in San Francisco, each earring is signed with a hand finished logo link.

name: Deco Glam Black Eye Earrings
description:
Deco, by way of the '60s. Mod geometric panel earrings, painstakingly hand-pieced with silver and black mesh from two vintage purses, joined with bright new gold mesh. Shapes are combined to form a strong, deco-glam statement.

Deco Glam Black Eye Earrings measure 3.75 inches from the 14 karat gold fill ear wires. Handmade in San Francisco, each earring is signed with a hand finished logo link.

name: Geo Checker Mesh Panel Earrings
description:
Deco mesh meets '60s op-art. Mod geometric panel earrings, painstakingly hand-pieced with black mesh from a vintage purse and bright new gold mesh. As always, a bold, fluid look that's still incredibly light to wear.

Geo Checker Mesh Panel Earrings measure 2.75 inches from the 14 karat gold fill ear wires. Handmade in San Francisco and signed with a hand finished signature link.

name: Dipstick Earrings - Gold
description:
Mod geometric earrings, hand-pieced with black and gold mesh from two vintage purses. This pair with gold at the base.

Dipstick Earrings measure 2.75 inches from the 14 karat gold fill ear wires. Handmade in San Francisco, each earring is signed with a hand finished logo link.

name: Dipstick Earrings - Black
description:
Mod geometric earrings, hand-pieced with black and gold mesh from two vintage purses. This pair with a black mesh base.

Dipstick Earrings measure 2.75 inches from the 14 karat gold fill ear wires. Handmade in San Francisco, each earring is signed with a hand finished logo link.

name: Horizon Mesh Earrings - Petrol Gold
description:
Bold gold statement earring with a design drawn in petrol/peacock hues. Bright, new, gold-plated brass mesh and chains, both treated to reveal a swirling grey-blue patina.

Horizon Mesh Earrings hang approximately 3.25" long including the 14k gold filled ear wires. Handmade in San Francisco, each earring is signed with a hand finished brass logo link.

name: Small Rustic Enamel Mesh Fringed Earrings
description:
An iconic piece of wearable history with lived in, romantic charm. Patinaed, enameled mesh earrings are up-cycled from a much-loved, early 1900s flapper purse. Hexagons of mesh are carved from the bag, suspended from custom, hand finished brass components, and generously fringed with graduated panels of vintage brass chains.

Each set of earrings from this purse features a unique patina of wear—no two are exactly alike.

Small Rustic Enamel Mesh Fringed Earrings hang approximately 3" long including the 14k gold filled, lever back ear wires. Handmade in San Francisco, each earring is signed with a hand finished brass logo link.

name: Small Enamel Mesh Fringed Earrings Turq Orange
description:
An iconic piece of wearable history. Bright enamel brass mesh, up-cycled from an early 1900s flapper purse. Hexagons of mesh are carved from the bag, suspended from custom, hand finished brass components, and generously fringed with graduated panels of vintage brass chains.

Each set of earrings from this purse features a unique patina of wear—no two are exactly alike.

Small Enamel Mesh Fringed Earrings Turq Orange hang approximately 3" long including the 14k gold filled, lever back ear wires. Handmade in San Francisco, each earring is signed with a hand finished brass logo link.

name: Speckle Green Swagged Mesh Earrings
description:
A glittering gold fragment from a bygone era, swagged earrings in a softly speckled abstraction. One-of-a-kind pattern with unique wear and patina. Original, hand-enameled deco mesh in shades of green and gold with select red accents. (Also available in all greens, without red accents.)

Mesh is culled from an early 1900s vintage flapper purse and generously swagged with a panel of vintage brass chains. Hexagon shape is surprisingly flattering to a variety of face types, and the swagged chain panel sways gracefully, with just the right amount of motion.

Speckle Green Swagged Mesh Earrings hang 2.75" long including the 14k gold filled, lever back ear wires. Handmade in San Francisco, each earring is signed with a hand finished brass logo link.

name: Spring Green Swagged Mesh Earrings
description:
With refreshing expanses of cool color, these swagged earrings make a dramatic statement while remaining whisper-light. One-of-a-kind pair.

Original, hand-enameled deco mesh - in spring green, periwinkle blue, and soft gold - is culled from an early 1900s vintage flapper purse and generously swagged with a panel of vintage brass chains. Hexagon shape is surprisingly flattering to a variety of face types, and the swagged chain panel sways gracefully, with just the right amount of motion.

Spring Green Swagged Mesh Earrings hang 2.75" long including the 14k gold filled, lever back ear wires. Handmade in San Francisco, each earring is signed with a hand finished brass logo link.

name: Bright Abstract Swagged Mesh Earrings
description:
With bold swaths of color, these playful swagged earrings are both vintage and modern - and as always, whisper-light. One-of-a-kind pair with unique graphic.

Original, hand-enameled, deco mesh is culled from an early 1900s vintage flapper purse and generously swagged with a panel of vintage brass chains. Hexagon shape is surprisingly flattering to a variety of face types, and the swagged chain panel sways gracefully, with just the right amount of motion.

Bright Abstract Swagged Mesh Earrings hang 2.75" long including the 14k gold filled, lever back ear wires. Handmade in San Francisco, each earring is signed with a hand finished brass logo link.

name: Hourglass Swagged Vintage Mesh Earrings
description:
A glittering fragment from a bygone era, these colorful swagged earrings make a dramatic statement while remaining whisper-light. One-of-a-kind pattern with unique graphic, wear, and patina.

Original, hand-enameled deco mesh - in coral, turquoise, and black on gold - is culled from an early 1900s vintage flapper purse and generously swagged with a panel of vintage brass chains. Hexagon shape is surprisingly flattering to a variety of face types, and the swagged chain panel sways gracefully, with just the right amount of motion.

Hourglass Swagged Vintage Mesh Earrings hang 2.75" long including the 14k gold filled, lever back ear wires. Handmade in San Francisco, each earring is signed with a hand finished brass logo link.

name: Hex Eye Swagged Vintage Mesh Earrings
description:
A colorful fragment from a bygone era, these dramatic swagged earrings make a bright, bold statement but remain surprisingly light. Only two pairs were created with this design, each with unique wear and patina.

Original, hand-enameled deco mesh - in coral, turquoise, and black on gold - is culled from an early 1900s vintage flapper purse and generously swagged with a panel of vintage brass chains. Hexagon shape is surprisingly flattering to a variety of face types, and the swagged chain panel sways gracefully, with just the right amount of motion.

Hex Eye Swagged Vintage Mesh Earrings hang 2.75" long including the 14k gold filled, lever back ear wires. Handmade in San Francisco, each earring is signed with a hand finished brass logo link.

name: Gold Eye Swagged Vintage Mesh Earrings
description:
A glittering fragment from a bygone era, these dramatic swagged earrings make a bright, bold statement but remain surprisingly light. Only two pairs were created with this design, each with unique wear and patina.

The original, hand-enameled deco mesh - coral and black on gold -  is culled from an early 1900s vintage flapper purse and generously swagged with a panel of vintage brass chains. Hexagon shape is flattering to a variety of face types, and the swagged chain panel sways gracefully, with just the right amount of motion. Composite image on model shows size.

Gold Eye Swagged Vintage Mesh Earrings hang 2.75" long including the 14k gold filled, lever back ear wires. Handmade in San Francisco, each earring is signed with a hand finished brass logo link.

name: Petit Four Swagged Vintage Mesh Earrings
description:
A glittering gold fragment from a bygone era, these swagged earrings make a dramatic statement while remaining whisper-light. One-of-a-kind pattern with unique graphic, wear, and patina.

Original, hand-enameled deco mesh - in coral, turquoise, and black on gold - is culled from an early 1900s vintage flapper purse and generously swagged with a panel of vintage brass chains. Hexagon shape is surprisingly flattering to a variety of face types, and the swagged chain panel sways gracefully, with just the right amount of motion. Composite image on model shows size.

Gold Eye Swagged Vintage Mesh Earrings hang 2.75" long including the 14k gold filled, lever back ear wires. Handmade in San Francisco, each earring is signed with a hand finished brass logo link.

name: Deco Abstraction Mesh Earrings - Wide Banners
description:
Like tiny modern masterpieces, colorful abstract shapes play across these artful mesh earrings made from a fantastic, hand-enameled 1920s flapper purse. Wide hexagon banners are painstakingly carved from the purse, paying careful attention to the layout of the pattern—and ensuring a hit of red on each earring (which makes all the difference.)

Wear an iconic piece of history—the genuine article. Each set of earrings from this bag features a unique pattern placement—no two are exactly alike but all pairs are well-matched for balance. Banners are suspended from custom, hand-finished brass components, designed to properly display the mesh, holding it open at all times.

Deco Abstraction Mesh Earrings hang 3" long including the 14k gold filled ear wires. Handmade in San Francisco, each earring is signed with a hand finished brass logo link.

name: Carnival Mesh Earrings - Wide Banners
description:
Bright colors play across these artful mesh earrings made from a fantastic 1920s-30s flapper purse. Wide hexagon banners are painstakingly carved from the purse, with careful attention to create a pleasing pattern.

Wear an iconic piece of history—the genuine article. Each set of earrings from this bag features a unique pattern placement—no two are exactly alike but all pairs are well-matched for balance. Banners are suspended from custom, hand-finished brass components, designed to properly display the mesh, holding it open at all times.

Carnival Wide Mesh Banner Earrings hang 3" long including the 14k gold filled ear wires. Handmade in San Francisco, each earring is signed with a hand finished brass logo link.

name: Heraldic Banner Mesh Earrings - Sage Multi
description:
Graphic points of bright, enamel deco mesh are pieced from an early 1900s, vintage flapper purse and generously fringed with vintage brass chains.

Heraldic Banner Mesh Earrings hang 3" long, including the 14k gold-filled, lever-back ear wires. Handmade in San Francisco, each earring is signed with a hand finished brass logo link.

name: Diamond Panel Fringed Mesh Earrings
description:
An iconic piece of wearable history. Make a sweeping, romantic statement with these enameled mesh earrings up-cycled from a much-loved, 1920s flapper purse. Large diamond-shaped pieces of mesh are carved from the bag, suspended from custom, hand finished brass components, and generously fringed with graduated panels of vintage brass chains.

The stripe pattern shown here will be consistent, yet each set of earrings from this bag features a unique patina of wear—no two are exactly alike.

Diamond Panel Fringed Mesh Earrings hang 4.5" long including the 14k gold filled, lever back ear wires. Handmade in San Francisco, each earring is signed with a hand finished brass logo link.

name: Large Fringed Banner Earrings - Black + White
description:
Weathered to a glittering gold, these op-art notched panel earrings are finished with a dramatic chevron fringe. A bold statement, but always whisper-light.

One-of-a-kind pattern has unique wear and patina. The original, hand-enameled deco mesh is culled from an early 1900s vintage flapper purse and generously draped with a graduated panel of vintage brass chains.

Large Black + White Fringed Banner Earrings hang 3.5" long including the 14k gold filled, french ear wires. Handmade in San Francisco, each earring is signed with a hand finished brass logo link.

name: Large Fringed Banner Earrings - Black + Gold
description:
A glittering fragment from a bygone era, these dramatic fringed earrings make a strong statement while remaining whisper-light. One-of-a-kind earrings with a unique pattern on each pair - yours may differ slightly from the earrings shown here.

Original enameled deco mesh is carefully extracted from an early 1900s vintage flapper purse by opening the individual links' tines, with great care taken to create a pleasing design. The final form is then suspended from a custom, hand finished, brass component designed to properly display the mesh, holding it open at all times. Finally, the earrings are generously draped with a graduated panel of vintage brass chains. Composite image on model (**of a different pair**) to show size.

Large Black + Gold Fringed Banner Earrings hang 3.5" long including the 14k gold filled, french ear wires. Handmade in San Francisco, each earring is signed with a hand finished brass logo link.

name: Pixelated Diamond Fringed Mesh Earrings
description:
Scattered in pixels of coral, black, and gold, these fringed earrings bring daytime drama but are surprisingly light.

Original, hand-enameled deco mesh is carefully extracted from an early 1900s vintage flapper purse, suspended from custom brass components, and fringed with waterfall panels of vintage brass chains.

Pixelated Diamond Fringed Vintage Mesh Earrings hang 3" long including the 14k gold filled, french ear wires. Handmade in San Francisco, each earring is signed with a hand finished brass logo link.

name: Triple Stack Vintage Mesh Bracelet - Rustic Silver
description:
Three glowing bands of patinaed silver mesh, culled from a reclaimed vintage purse and wrapped around natural leather cording.

Triple Stack Leather and Mesh Bracelet measures 7 inches around and closes with a sterling silver plated lobster clasp. Handmade in San Francisco and signed with a hand-finished logo link.

name: Vintage Mesh Mixology Bracelet
description:
Multi-strand bracelet features natural leather cording wrapped with vintage gold and antique enamel mesh, then studded with chunky vintage turquoise and an antique, African trade bead, circa 1810.

Brass lobster clasp closure accented with an aventurine coin bead and brass signature logo link.

A great layering piece, the last image shows this bracelet stacked with several others.

name: Vintage Mesh Mixology Bracelet 3
description: Leather cording wrapped with silver metal mesh reclaimed from a vintage purse, then studded with chunky vintage turquoise and mother-of-pearl beads. Silver lobster clasp closure accented with an aventurine coin bead and signature logo link.

name: Vintage Mesh and Leather Surround Bracelet
description:
Softly glittering band of gold plated brass mesh, culled from a reclaimed vintage purse, wrapped around natural brown leather cording and accented with two contrasting grey leather bands.

Vintage Mesh and Leather Surround Bracelet measures 7" around, mesh focal is .75" x 1.75". Handmade in San Francisco and signed with a hand-finished brass logo link.

name: Neon Striped Mesh Necklace - Blue Flame
description:
Stylish yet playful, this pendant necklace features bright neon mesh pieced into stripes and bordered in 18K gold plated brass chain. Silver plated, Whiting & Davis mesh is powder-coated by hand in small batches. Made in San Francisco and signed with a neon signature link.

Neon Striped Mesh Necklace measures 32" around, mesh pendant dropping an additional 2.5".

name: Neon Striped Mesh Necklace - Fuchsia Sunset
description:
Stylish yet playful, this pendant necklace features bright neon mesh pieced into stripes and bordered in 18K gold plated brass chain. Silver plated, Whiting & Davis mesh is powder-coated by hand in small batches. Made in San Francisco and signed with a neon signature link.

Neon Striped Mesh Necklace measures 32" around, mesh pendant dropping an additional 2.5".

name: Vintage Copper Feather Arrow Earrings
description:
Solid copper deco links from a mid-century Renoir necklace form the focus of these strong earrings, detailed with a long tail of dark oxidized sterling silver rolo chains.

A departure from the mesh jewelry, these versatile graphic earrings follow the same principle—deconstructing a vintage piece and showcasing its powerful, individual design elements in a contemporary, highly wearable way.

You'll find yourself reaching for these simple, striking earrings day after day.

Vintage Copper Feather Arrow Earrings hang 3.5" long, including the dark oxidized sterling silver ear wires. Handmade in San Francisco.
